title: Hello i need your help!
body:
I was on leauge of legends today in the loading screen using project yasuo and i realized i had the first strike border when this skin was bought for me months after it came out 
what could this be about?

replies.body:
*Zombiemaster* is correct here. Anyone who owns PROJECT:Yasuo, before the event ends (even if you bought him before the event), will get his First Strike loading border automatically unlocked. This is mentioned on the [PROJECT:Disruption FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h4).

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Project Yasuo was the only project skin not released with the first strike border. I believe since they didn't give him the border with the last round of project skins, Riot decided to give anyone who already has this skin the first strike border.
